      • getIndexForTask

        public int getIndexForTask(java.util.Date dueDate)
        Returns task index for new task to be added/edited. If tasks available in database then return (size of existing tasks + 1) otherwise returns 1
        Parameters:
        dueDate - due date of Task
        Returns:
        Task Index
